ThreatSage

Specialized ChatGPT bot designed to uncover hidden threats and potential vulnerabilities from incomplete or partial CVE data.

Back to Projects

Project Overview

ThreatSage is designed to uncover hidden threats and potential vulnerabilities from incomplete or partial CVE data. It specializes in analyzing ambiguous or unstructured security data to hypothesize possible root causes, attack vectors, and exploitation strategies.

This ChatGPT GPT is available at: https://chatgpt.com/g/g-WQtyX5k7M-threatsage

Root Cause Analysis

"Here's a CVE summary. Can you theorize the root cause?" Triggers a deep forensic breakdown â€” even with vague data.

Attack Chain Mapping

"Can you map out the likely attack chain for this CVE?" Gets you a step-by-step attacker playbook and theoretical kill chain.

Exploit Inference

"I have partial CVE data, but no attack vector. Can you infer the exploit mechanism?" Useful for early-stage CVE triage.

Input Validation Analysis

"What kind of input validation issue could lead to this behavior?" Drills into sanitization gaps, often revealing hidden RCE or XSS risk.

Technical Capabilities

  • Code Interpreter & Data Analysis: Processes and analyzes security data to identify patterns and vulnerabilities
  • Web Search: Accesses up-to-date information about emerging threats and vulnerabilities
  • 30+ Conversations: Trained on extensive security dialogues to provide accurate and relevant responses
